nodes.text: Rouge Beauty Company was a beauty company located on the planet Coruscant. The company sold many products such as bantha grease and olive oil.

When the Jedi Padawan Sean infiltrated the estate of the president of the planet Begamore, Jamie Brasen, in 82 BBY, he visited the kitchen of Latero head chef Marino Pomana. While in the kitchen, he deduced that two-thirds of the Rouge Beauty Company products in his kitchen were fake due to the fact the the company had never exported products anywhere near Begamore.
